body:
@mwhudson I looked at what's shipped in Wiley and it looks like you're pulling gcc from a devel repo. Can you confirm? If that's the case, is there a docker binary in there too? Runc picked up our fix for this (https://github.com/opencontainers/runc/pull/199), so if you can use the latest docker with the latest gcc, you should be set (as far as this particular issue is concerned). 

Edit: s/a docker binary/docker source (IIUC).
